definition: lesson plan/teaching plan/a "missionary case" (a dispute over Christian missionaries during the late Qing)

sentences.english: You have to write teaching plans for every class. School will check them.
sentences.chinese: 在上课之前你必须写出教案，学校会定期检查。

sentences.english: There is a great contrast in the number of missionary cases in Shandong between before Gengzi and after then.
sentences.chinese: 庚子前后，山东地区的教案在数量上呈现巨大的反差。

sentences.english: In the late Qing Dynasty, missionary hospital had some relations with the anti-Christian cases.
sentences.chinese: 教会医院与晚清教案发生了较多联系。

sentences.english: But there appears the phenomenon of excessive dependence on electronic teaching plan and electronic courseware.
sentences.chinese: 但也出现了过分依赖电子教案和电子课件的现象。

sentences.english: Instructional Design in SCORM Teaching Materials- Learning …
sentences.chinese: 资讯科技融入教学的教案与教材设计。

sentences.english: Three professors were invited to design the curriculum for new tefeel sorers arschfickyze.
sentences.chinese: 三位教授被请来对新教员设计的教案做出评价。

sentences.english: Three professors are invited to evaluate the teaching plans by the three new teachers.
sentences.chinese: 三位教授被请来对新教员设计的教案作出评估。

sentences.english: How will you know whether the design is effective?
sentences.chinese: 如何知道教案的设计是否有效？

sentences.english: Teachers should focus on creative lesson plans that are diverse and use a wide range realia.
sentences.chinese: 教师应注重教案的多样化和使用各种教具协助教学。

sentences.english: The appendix encloses one case of a teaching plan on ChineseComprehensive Study made by the author.
sentences.chinese: 附录中附有笔者的一堂语文综合性学习课的教案。

sentences.english: Three professors were asked to make on evaluation of the teaching plans devised by the new teachers.
sentences.chinese: 三位教授被请来对新教员设计的教案作出评估。

sentences.english: This text gives an example of cartoon film making in order to show how to make electronic teaching plans.
sentences.chinese: 本文拟用制作一个简单电子教案的实例加以叙述。

sentences.english: Where would you like to go on vacation, Sam?
sentences.chinese: 萨姆九年级历史下册教案，你想到哪里去度假？

sentences.english: Guests visit the Vincent To Central Library cum Resource Centre.
sentences.chinese: 嘉宾参观本局杜伟中央图书馆暨教案资源中心。

sentences.english: He knows how to drive a automotive!
sentences.chinese: 他知道如何开车，排球垫球教案。

sentences.english: Three professors were asked to make an uation of the teaching plan devised by new teachers.
sentences.chinese: 三位教授被请来对新教员设计的教案作出评估。

definition: courseware (abbr. for 課程軟件|课程软件[ke4 cheng2 ruan3 jian4])
to write on the blackboard/writing on the blackboard
to mark (homework, exam scripts etc)/to correct and criticize (an article)/to check/to correct/a correction (to a piece of writing)
to give classes/to work as a teacher
